name: RichmondTimes-Dispatch
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Get your local news update from the Richmond Times-Dispatch and start your day with headlines that affect our community. The RTD’s Alexa app is updated each weekday morning and afternoon with important news and information for Richmond and the surrounding area. Just ask Alexa to play the flash briefing and start your day with the RTD. These twice-daily reports are assembled and read by professional journalists.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
